name: Small and thoughtful
tagline: A collection of gifts that are small on price but big on thoughtful. Perfect when you just need to get a little something.

gifts.name: Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar
gifts.description: Any budding chiefs in the house? Get them the salt of choice for chefs around the world. A perfect little helper.

image.alt_text: Image of Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Peace out puffy eyes
gifts.description: Lets be honest we could all do with a little pick me up from time to time. These are the remedy. 15 mins and tiredness be gone.

image.alt_text: Image of Peace out puffy eyes. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Coco Drinking Chocolate
gifts.description: Smooth, rich, luxurious! A real treat!

image.alt_text: Image of Coco Drinking Chocolate. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Black coffee scoop clip
gifts.description: A classic item for a homemaker, coffee lover or just about anyone. Also available in gold, silver and rose gold.

image.alt_text: Image of Black coffee scoop clip. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Tunnock's mug
gifts.description: Who doesn't love a Tunnocks right? Exactly, so why not get them a matching mug for their accompanying brew.

image.alt_text: Image of Tunnock's mug. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Lip Balm by Le Labo
gifts.description: A high quality, plant-based lip balm perfect for a handbag, pocket or kitbag.

image.alt_text: Image of Lip Balm by Le Labo. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Seedball Mini-Meadow
gifts.description: A great little kit for the green and non-green-fingered alike. Bamboo pots, wildflower seedballs and a promise of bloom. Lovely stuff.

image.alt_text: Image of Seedball Mini-Meadow. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Aesop Aromatique Hand Balm. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: A safe travel adapter plug
gifts.description: Not sexy, but universally needed and therefore appreciated.

image.alt_text: Image of A safe travel adapter plug. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sushi starter kit
gifts.description: Everything someone needs - except the fish - to have fun making sushi

image.alt_text: Image of Sushi starter kit. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Cazcabel Tequila coffee liqueur. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Aromatique incense gift. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Chocolate mini brownie box
gifts.description: A delicious chocolate-y treat through the post. Yep.

image.alt_text: Image of Chocolate mini brownie box. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Luxury Tennis Themed Socks
gifts.description: Stylish socks to wear on your next trip to Wimbledon or anywhere really.

image.alt_text: Image of Luxury Tennis Themed Socks. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Botanic Garden Harmony Cup & Saucer
gifts.description: A cute little cup and saucer that's the perfect gift for a new home.

image.alt_text: Image of Botanic Garden Harmony Cup & Saucer. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Cosy nights scented candle
gifts.description: Give the gift of frankincense, sandalwood and nutmeg, and help them reset and recharge. At home or on the go (apparently)

image.alt_text: Image of Cosy nights scented candle. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Handmade Ceramic Taco Truck. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Jerez garlic crusher
gifts.description: Chopping garlic into tiny pieces can be a real pain. So use this fancy-looking plate to create a paste instead.

image.alt_text: Image of Jerez garlic crusher. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Raspberry jelly sweets
gifts.description: This little gems are a recreation of a sweet produced since 1873 - so have that old school, cool retro vibe going on. They are also delicious and big enough to share.

image.alt_text: Image of Raspberry jelly sweets. A great gift to give someone special.
